name: GB Spooky Castle
description:
GB Spooky Castle is a small clone prototype of the famous Castlevania that I made as part of my devlog series GB Studio Clone Challenge. In three rooms of an old castle a little hero fights his way against ghosts, pumpkins and a nasty bat. 

Collect treasures and new weapons by destroying the candles on the walls.

To play through the prototype you need just 2 minutes. It's more for testing the possibilities of Chris Maltby's GB Studio 2 and maybe even to inspire interested people to try a project with the mechanics of Castlevania using the engine themselves. 

If you want to know how I made the prototype, feel free to check out my YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAqti9ffZvBAzmsLFPHjF_w

Controls

Movement: [directional pad] - [W, A, S, D]

Attack: [A] - [J] 

Jump: [B] - [K]

Change weapons: [Select] - [Shift]

Have fun!

PS: Feel free to post your score in the comments and share your thoughts on the prototype.
